text: Jehu guu hai dana hagababa belee hai baahi gi di king Joram, dela i Jezreel, dela ne hana belee haga hili ono gowaa ne moholehole i lodo tauwa i Ramoth nogo hai baahi gi di king Hazael o Syria. Jehu ga helekai gi ono ehoo aamua, “Maa goodou e madalia au, malaa, goodou hudee dumaalia gi dahi dangada gi ulu mai gi daha mo Ramoth, gi dee hana a mee ga haga iloo gi nia daangada o Jezreel.”
